ComicInfo.Title: Night Of The Flame Cycles!
ComicInfo.Summary:
When a young stunt cyclist's circus performing parents are murdered in an extortion attempt, he is tempted into selling his soul to avenge their wrongful deaths. Only the Ghost Rider's intervention can prevent the boy from making the same mistake Johnny Blaze made not so long ago.
After steering the boy's destiny in the right direction, the Ghost Rider takes it upon himself to avenge the fallen parents!
